## Example of an animated figure

```{python}
# | output: asis
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from pyfragments import AnimatedFigure

with AnimatedFigure() as ani:
    plt.xlim(0, 10)
    plt.ylim(0, 10)
    for i in range(10):
        with ani.fragment():
            plt.scatter(i, i)

```
